files.README.md:
# CC-Plugins

[![Built with Claude Code](https://img.shields.io/badge/Built%20with-Claude%20Code-blue?logo=anthropic&logoColor=white)](https://claude.ai/claude-code) ![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg) ![Claude Code Required](https://img.shields.io/badge/Claude_Code-Required-blue.svg) ![Status: Active](https://img.shields.io/badge/Status-Active-green.svg)


# Overview

A variety of Claude Code plugins, skills, hooks, and MCPs carefully selected during the development process. The repository will be continuously updated.


# Quick Start

## Manual Installation:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/bailu2025/CC-Plugins.git

cd CC-Plugins

# install skills
cp -a plugins/* ~/.claude/skills/
```


# Status
**Version:** 1.0.0
**Status:** Production-ready
**Last Updated:** November 2025

Recent updates:

- v1.0.0: First Commitï¼ŒSubmitted the Skills of Go language frameworks Echo and Gin


# Contributing
Contributions welcome! Open an issue or PR at [https://github.com/bailu2025/CC-Plugins](https://github.com/bailu2025/CC-Plugins)


# License
MIT License - see [LICENSE](./LICENSE)
